def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    New Feature 2: weight_imbalance | weight_imbalance = (Left-Weight - Right-Weight) / max(Left-Weight, Right-Weight)
    
    The feature weight_imbalance captures the proportion of imbalance between Left-Weight and Right-Weight.
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    
    # Calculate the proportion of imbalance between Left-Weight and Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_imbalance'] = ((df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight']) / 
                                     np.maximum(df_output['Left-Weight'], df_output['Right-Weight']))
    
    # Calculate the absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance
    df_output['distance_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Distance'] - df_output['Right-Distance'])
